abstract: Gary Lincoff, author of the Audubon Society's "Field Guide to North American Mushrooms," is fielding questions about local fungi and, perhaps, identifying that weird, spiky blob you photographed.
snippet: Gary Lincoff, author of the Audubon Society's "Field Guide to North American Mushrooms," is fielding questions about local fungi and, perhaps, identifying that weird, spiky blob you photographed.
lead_paragraph: Oct. 17: Please note: we are no longer accepting photos for this feature. Too many mushrooms already! Thanks to those who sent in the 300 or so pix we have received.

headline.main: Want to Know About That Mushroom? Just Ask
